casebody.data:
Ridder Williams CROCKER, Individually and on Behalf Her Deceased Son, Jerry Lee Sheppard
v.
BATON ROUGE GENERAL MEDICAL CENTER-MID CITY and its Staff, Including but Not Limited to the Behavioral Health Unit, William T. Elliot, M.D. and Joseph Thomas, Jr., M.D. NO. 2018-C-1911 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 18, 2019 Denied. HUGHES, J., would grant.

GENOVESE, J., would grant for reasons assigned by Judge McDonald.
